channel.title: Thanks!
channel.description:
Hello Mods, thanks for the Rep Reset. I love how uhh. you go around reseting peoples rep, when you dont do half the other things you are suppose to be doing. I think you guys should do your job and rejuvinate these forums rather than being comlete idots running around de repping ppl for stupid reasons like this
[sup]rep appreciated but not needed[/sup]
[size=20pt]We need new mods. the ones we have are pricks[/size] spam

item.title: Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

I freakin mentioned it once, not even taking into considerastion that i DID NOT ASK! I simply stated that its appreciated.

Bad thing to do:
gimme rep or i remove

perfectly fine thing to do
rep is appreciated but not needed at all

Read full topic

item.title: Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Matrix be quiet, you asked for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:9, topic:229416”]The rule is to not mention rep at all,

You said that “Rep is appreciated”, In that part your basically asking for rep,
And your rep won’t be put back up,

Grow up and stop complaining about a number,
It means nothing but people complaining about it,
It means the person is a complete idiot.[/quote]No. He is right. Mods don’t do shit about spam or other things, but when “rep” is mentioned they automatically rep reset.

Read full topic

item.title: Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:9, topic:229416”]The rule is to not mention rep at all,

You said that “Rep is appreciated”, In that part your basically asking for rep,
And your rep won’t be put back up,

Grow up and stop complaining about a number,
It means nothing but people complaining about it,
It means the person is a complete idiot.[/quote]

umm. ya i agree. its a number. but im saying. the mods have nothing better to do but to reset stupid rep rather than ban the idiots who post disturbing links, vids and pics. and post fuxin crashers…

tyvm GF

Read full topic

item.title: Thanks!

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

The rule is to not mention rep at all,

You said that “Rep is appreciated”, In that part your basically asking for rep,
And your rep won’t be put back up,

Grow up and stop complaining about a number,
It means nothing but people complaining about it,

so shut up… tyvm

item.title: Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Add your name to the idiot list in your signature please,
The mods we have now are fine,

You just probably broke the rules,
And now are complaining about a number.

Read full topic
